name: Root of color
description:
Welcome to a world devoid of color, where everything is cast in shades of gray. But it's time for a change, as you have been tasked with the responsibility of infusing this world with a splash of life. With every stroke of your brush, the dull grayscale world will come to life as vibrant hues burst forth.

With every root you color, the world will come to life before your very eyes. You'll encounter obstacles and challenges along the way, but with your determination, you'll turn this once lifeless world into a kaleidoscope of color.

But be warned, the journey to collect all the hidden gems and color the world will not be easy. Can you rise to the challenge and bring life back to the roots of this forgotten world? The journey awaits, so grab your brush and let's get started!"

Manual

Arrow keys (or ZQSD) to move the main character
Mouse to look around and change view
